errors.error_description: Mixing conda and pip commands inconsistently - using conda install for some packages but pip install for others in the same environment setup.
correction_candidates: Use pip install consistently for all package installations
Use conda install for all packages including jupyterlab and ipywidgets
Add a note explaining when to use conda vs pip in mixed environments
Separate the instructions into two different environment setup approaches
errors.golden_answer: Use pip install consistently for all package installations
